titleStmt.title: A letter, containing some reflections, on a discourse called Good advice to the Church of England, &c. and upon three letters from a gentlemen in the country to his friend in London about the repeal of the penal laws and tests

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: pages stained and last leaf torn with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
